title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
description: The sorcerer's apprentice is not allowed to cast any spells until she finishes magic school. But when the sorcerer's away, she breaks that rule and casts a spell to speed up her chores... and things don't go as planned! The Sorcerer's Apprentice is a fun poem filled with colorful illustrations and an engaging storyline. It can be used to teach students how to make, revise, and confirm predictions as well as to identify the problem and solution in a story.
